CustomField.description: The maximum number of batches to return from OFAC search (and thus the max number of http callouts) - based on governor limits as of Spring 2016, should be no bigger than 100
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The maximum number of batches to return from OFAC search (and thus the max number of http callouts) - based on governor limits as of Spring 2016, should be no bigger than 100
CustomField.label: Max batches
